backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing building management system with user profiles, building creation, invite code system, and role-based access control (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin) using Motoko Map and AccessControl mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five features related to removing invite code registration from login page and moving it to home page onboarding section with building creation functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the building management application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with building management color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with Turkish title 'Bina Yönetim ERP Uygulaması' and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with authentication context, protected routes (dashboard, home, profile, users), and loading state handling using Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/components/BuildingCreateFo: Form component for creating new buildings with validation, loading states, error handling, and success callbacks using shadcn/ui components and Turkish labels.
Invite code management panel for building owners with role selection (yetkili/sakin), code creation, clipboard copy functionality, and table displaying all created codes with their usage status.
frontend/src/components/InviteCodeRegist: Component for registering users via invite codes with 16-character validation, authentication check, and form submission (content truncated in provided file).
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component that wraps pages with a navigation header, content area using React Router's Outlet, and a footer with copyright and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile (sheet) menus, displaying nav items (Panel, Ana Sayfa, Kullanıcılar, Profil) with active state highlighting and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, buildings, invite codes, and registration, all using the useActor hook for authenticated canister calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components (primary, secondary, muted, destructive, etc.) and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying user welcome message, first-login notification, and three cards showing user status, login date, and principal ID with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that handles building creation, invite code registration, and displays role-based content for users with or without a building association. Includes forms for creating buildings and joining via invite codes with validation.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component that provides Internet Identity authentication with a branded interface. Redirects authenticated users to home and displays error messages for failed login attempts.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page displaying user account information including Principal ID, authentication method, role badge, and session details. Shows loading skeletons while fetching user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx: Users list page with placeholder implementation showing a table structure for displaying all users with their roles. Currently displays a development notice as the backend endpoint is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/utils/roleTranslations.ts: Utility functions for translating Role enum values to Turkish display names and mapping roles to badge variants (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to get, store, clear, and persist parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a multi-tenant building management ERP system using Internet Identity authentication. Documents architectural decisions, existing features (authentication, user management, building/invitation system), and development phases with Turkish UI and mobile-responsive design.
